website_summaries.verdict: Combination of fabric on the exterior and plush material on the interior give this cat harness a soft feel for the pet, while remaining durable.
pros: Cat owners say this vest's sizes are accurate and fit the animals well
cons: Some customers don't like tight fit around the middle of the pet
Some pet owners say their cats were able to wiggle out of the harness

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but unhappy cat.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to say because it depends so much on the cat. Appearance wise it's adorable. However my cat seems very uncomfortable walking in it. The issue is that when it's tight enough that I feel safe that he's secure, it seems to bug him under his arms. However when I losen it enough that he walks comfortable, I can tell he could slip out too easily. For now, it works for carrying him to the car with the extra security of having it on in case I need to set him down briefly. Better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: P!

customer_reviews.title: The size small fits him really good now and it's pretty cute with the little theme ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this because their size chart was off. My cat's measurement according to their chart should be a really tight medium which is what I got the first time. It was so big that within 10 steps of walking, one of his front paw would be out of the sleeve/hole already. Another 10 steps the whole vest became a belt on his waist and fall off in 3 seconds. The size small fits him really good now and it's pretty cute with the little theme going on. Now I walk my cat everyday and the harness works pretty well even with him pulling.
customer_reviews.author: J Norika

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the best leash/harness for my pup ever. It's a little big, but he's a pup and he'll grow into it in a couple weeks. Already got a ton of compliments when I took him on a walk! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Cindylou

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but is useless
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for my cat, who has a similar size and coloring as the b/w kitty pictured. It didn't fit, was too restrictive around her middle and under her legs, and the lease was too short to do any good. It's cute, but not very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Applewhite MinyardTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: VERY EASY ON THE HANDS GETTING THIS ON THE CAT
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY ON THE HANDS GETTING THIS ON THE CAT, CAT'S NOT SO EASY; BUT DAILY USE HAS CONVINCED THEM-TOM & JERRY-THAT HARNESS MEANS GOING OUTSIDE BUT NEITHER CAT LIKES BEING ON A LEASH. TOM JUST LAYS DOWN AND YOU CAN JUST DRAG HIM IN THE GRASS IF YOU WANT HIM TO MOVE. JERRY IS OK WITH THE LEASH AS LONG AS YOU DON'T HOLD IT. WE'RE WORKING ON IT. AND, THEY LOOK REALLY CUTE!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen  E/tazer111

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well-made set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, but my cat, not so much. It's not so much the harness and leash as getting used to wearing them. He sure looks cute in them while we practice! Well-constructed and sturdy. I look forward to letting him explore his world once he's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wormald

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write reviews but this little walking vest for cats and dogs was so nice I felt I had to ! It is so well made and pretty and I really love it . Will order more !
customer_reviews.author: Lora Tesh

customer_reviews.title: ... almost two years ago and she is honestly more comfortable in it than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my cat almost two years ago and she is honestly more comfortable in it than I expected. She used it on a plane trip, and in daily walks, and it's lasting and seeming to work.
customer_reviews.author: Andris Royd

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Harness!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The fit is just perfect and looks very attractive. Very well made and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela

customer_reviews.title: really cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 lb. Yorkie ...really cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god, the cutest thing on my kitty ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Spence

customer_reviews.title: PURRRRFECT!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is now almost full grown and it fits him nicely! Lots of compliments and he likes it after a little coaxing! :o)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my cat was too large for the leash.. ...
customer_reviews.text: my cat was too large for the leash.... even though the product is for small dogs, it does not work for extra large cat....I guess
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this harness
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness. It looks so cute on my cat and is easy for her to get into. Great for people who boat with their cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective leash
customer_reviews.text: The leash doesn't work :(. I wish they could just send me new leash. Overall it's really cute. I would have given them 5 stars if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: The harness is very nice, but it's a little big on her
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 kilo chihuahua and she uses the small. The harness is very nice, but it's a little big on her. I also think that the black straps and clips should be further back. It's a big clip and a little heavy so if sits on my dogs neck and she does not like it. I think if they used a smaller black clip and moved the strap about 1.5 cm back it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a little too big for my small cat, hope he grows some more!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mefford

customer_reviews.title: Measurements off, not for a cat.
customer_reviews.text: Not for cats. The measurements given for the the S one are completely off.
customer_reviews.author: Severo
